parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Valeriu Iftime" and his team, strongly suggesting a reference to a specific candidate.  This fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies the requirement of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The question posed in the post ("What message do the people of Botoșani transmit to Valeriu Iftime's team for Parliament?") directly aims to gauge public opinion regarding the candidate and his chances. The hashtags further reinforce this electoral objective.  The overall goal appears to be influencing voters' choices, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post's style is more akin to a poll or opinion piece than objective journalism. While it presents itself as "VOCEA străzii" (the voice of the street), the framing and the explicit mention of a candidate strongly suggest an intention to influence the vote rather than simply reporting facts.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it actively seeks to shape public opinion regarding a specific candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1106326714453008</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, while not explicitly advocating for or against Valeriu Iftime, functions as electoral propaganda. It targets a specific candidate, uses targeted advertising to reach a wide audience in Botoșani County, and aims to influence voters' opinions by posing a leading question about their support for the candidate.  The absence of a CMF number is a mitigating factor, but the clear electoral objective outweighs this. The post's design and phrasing are suggestive of an attempt to sway public opinion in favor of Valeriu Iftime.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea Botosani</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1106326714453008) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care, deși nu face o susținere explicită, promovează indirect candidatul Valeriu Iftime printr-o întrebare sugestivă adresată publicului larg din județul Botoșani, vizând influențarea votului în favoarea acestuia.  Postarea, având un caracter electoral evident,  se adresează publicului larg prin intermediul unei campanii de publicitate plătite pe Facebook, îndeplinind astfel toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  Întrebarea "Ce mesaj transmit botoșănenii #echipei Valeriu Iftime pentru Parlament?" are un efect electoral clar, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea lui Valeriu Iftime.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
